description: Gets the celebrity recognition results for a Amazon Rekognition Video analysis started by  StartCelebrityRecognition. Celebrity recognition in a video is an asynchronous operation. Analysis is started by a call to  StartCelebrityRecognition which returns a job identifier ( JobId). When the celebrity recognition operation finishes, Amazon Rekognition Video publishes a completion status to the Amazon Simple Notification Service topic registered in the initial call to StartCelebrityRecognition. To get the results of the celebrity recognition analysis, first check that the status value published to the Amazon SNS topic is SUCCEEDED. If so, call GetCelebrityDetection and pass the job identifier ( JobId) from the initial call to StartCelebrityDetection. For more information, see Working With Stored Videos in the Amazon Rekognition Developer Guide. GetCelebrityRecognition returns detected celebrities and the time(s) they are detected in an array ( Celebrities) of  CelebrityRecognition objects. Each CelebrityRecognition contains information about the celebrity in a  CelebrityDetail object and the time, Timestamp, the celebrity was detected. This  CelebrityDetail object stores information about the detected celebrity's face attributes, a face bounding box, known gender, the celebrity's name, and a confidence estimate. By default, the Celebrities array is sorted by time (milliseconds from the start of the video). You can also sort the array by celebrity by specifying the value ID in the SortBy input parameter. The CelebrityDetail object includes the celebrity identifer and additional information urls. If you don't store the additional information urls, you can get them later by calling  GetCelebrityInfo with the celebrity identifer. No information is returned for faces not recognized as celebrities. Use MaxResults parameter to limit the number of labels returned. If there are more results than specified in MaxResults, the value of NextToken in the operation response contains a pagination token for getting the next set of results. To get the next page of results, call GetCelebrityDetection and populate the NextToken request parameter with the token value returned from the previous call to GetCelebrityRecognition.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: Job identifier for the required celebrity recognition analysis. You can get the job identifer from a call to StartCelebrityRecognition.

nested_items.name: JobStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the celebrity recognition job.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: If the job fails, StatusMessage provides a descriptive error message.

nested_items.name: VideoMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about a video that Amazon Rekognition Video analyzed. Videometadata is returned in every page of paginated responses from a Amazon Rekognition Video operation.

nested_items.name: Codec
nested_items.description: Type of compression used in the analyzed video.

nested_items.name: DurationMillis
nested_items.description: Length of the video in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: Format of the analyzed video. Possible values are MP4, MOV and AVI.

nested_items.name: FrameRate
nested_items.description: Number of frames per second in the video.

nested_items.name: FrameHeight
nested_items.description: Vertical pixel dimension of the video.

nested_items.name: FrameWidth
nested_items.description: Horizontal pixel dimension of the video.

nested_items.name: ColorRange
nested_items.description: A description of the range of luminance values in a video, either LIMITED (16 to 235) or FULL (0 to 255).

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Rekognition Video returns this token that you can use in the subsequent request to retrieve the next set of celebrities.

nested_items.name: Celebrities
nested_items.description: Array of celebrities recognized in the video.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: The time, in milliseconds from the start of the video, that the celebrity was recognized. Note that Timestamp is not guaranteed to be accurate to the individual frame where the celebrity first appears.

nested_items.name: Celebrity
nested_items.description: Information about a recognized celebrity.

nested_items.name: Urls
nested_items.description: An array of URLs pointing to additional celebrity information.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the celebrity.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the celebrity.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: The confidence, in percentage, that Amazon Rekognition has that the recognized face is the celebrity.

nested_items.name: BoundingBox
nested_items.description: Bounding box around the body of a celebrity.

nested_items.name: Width
nested_items.description: Width of the bounding box as a ratio of the overall image width.

nested_items.name: Height
nested_items.description: Height of the bounding box as a ratio of the overall image height.

nested_items.name: Left
nested_items.description: Left coordinate of the bounding box as a ratio of overall image width.

nested_items.name: Top
nested_items.description: Top coordinate of the bounding box as a ratio of overall image height.

nested_items.name: BoundingBox
nested_items.description: Bounding box of the face. Default attribute.

nested_items.name: Width
nested_items.description: Width of the bounding box as a ratio of the overall image width.

nested_items.name: Height
nested_items.description: Height of the bounding box as a ratio of the overall image height.

nested_items.name: Left
nested_items.description: Left coordinate of the bounding box as a ratio of overall image width.

nested_items.name: Top
nested_items.description: Top coordinate of the bounding box as a ratio of overall image height.

nested_items.name: Low
nested_items.description: The lowest estimated age.

nested_items.name: High
nested_items.description: The highest estimated age.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Boolean value that indicates whether the face is smiling or not.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Level of confidence in the determination.

nested_items.name: Eyeglasses
nested_items.description: Indicates whether or not the face is wearing eye glasses, and the confidence level in the determination.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Boolean value that indicates whether the face is wearing eye glasses or not.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Level of confidence in the determination.

nested_items.name: Sunglasses
nested_items.description: Indicates whether or not the face is wearing sunglasses, and the confidence level in the determination.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Boolean value that indicates whether the face is wearing sunglasses or not.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Level of confidence in the determination.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The predicted gender of the face.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Level of confidence in the prediction.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Boolean value that indicates whether the face has beard or not.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Level of confidence in the determination.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Boolean value that indicates whether the face has mustache or not.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Level of confidence in the determination.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Boolean value that indicates whether the eyes on the face are open.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Level of confidence in the determination.

nested_items.name: MouthOpen
nested_items.description: Indicates whether or not the mouth on the face is open, and the confidence level in the determination.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Boolean value that indicates whether the mouth on the face is open or not.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Level of confidence in the determination.

nested_items.name: Emotions
nested_items.description: The emotions that appear to be expressed on the face, and the confidence level in the determination. The API is only making a determination of the physical appearance of a person's face. It is not a determination of the person's internal emotional state and should not be used in such a way. For example, a person pretending to have a sad face might not be sad emotionally.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Type of emotion detected.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Level of confidence in the determination.

nested_items.name: Landmarks
nested_items.description: Indicates the location of landmarks on the face. Default attribute.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Type of landmark.

nested_items.name: X
nested_items.description: The x-coordinate of the landmark expressed as a ratio of the width of the image. The x-coordinate is measured from the left-side of the image. For example, if the image is 700 pixels wide and the x-coordinate of the landmark is at 350 pixels, this value is 0.5.

nested_items.name: Y
nested_items.description: The y-coordinate of the landmark expressed as a ratio of the height of the image. The y-coordinate is measured from the top of the image. For example, if the image height is 200 pixels and the y-coordinate of the landmark is at 50 pixels, this value is 0.25.

nested_items.name: Roll
nested_items.description: Value representing the face rotation on the roll axis.

nested_items.name: Yaw
nested_items.description: Value representing the face rotation on the yaw axis.

nested_items.name: Pitch
nested_items.description: Value representing the face rotation on the pitch axis.

nested_items.name: Brightness
nested_items.description: Value representing brightness of the face. The service returns a value between 0 and 100 (inclusive). A higher value indicates a brighter face image.

nested_items.name: Sharpness
nested_items.description: Value representing sharpness of the face. The service returns a value between 0 and 100 (inclusive). A higher value indicates a sharper face image.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Confidence level that the bounding box contains a face (and not a different object such as a tree). Default attribute.

nested_items.name: FaceOccluded
nested_items.description: FaceOccluded should return 'true' with a high confidence score if a detected face's eyes, nose, and mouth are partially captured or if they are covered by masks, dark sunglasses, cell phones, hands, or other objects. FaceOccluded should return 'false' with a high confidence score if common occurrences that do not impact face verification are detected, such as eye glasses, lightly tinted sunglasses, strands of hair, and others.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: True if a detected face's eyes, nose, and mouth are partially captured or if they are covered by masks, dark sunglasses, cell phones, hands, or other objects. False if common occurrences that do not impact face verification are detected, such as eye glasses, lightly tinted sunglasses, strands of hair, and others.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: The confidence that the service has detected the presence of a face occlusion.

nested_items.name: EyeDirection
nested_items.description: Indicates the direction the eyes are gazing in, as defined by pitch and yaw.

nested_items.name: Yaw
nested_items.description: Value representing eye direction on the yaw axis.

nested_items.name: Pitch
nested_items.description: Value representing eye direction on the pitch axis.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: The confidence that the service has in its predicted eye direction.

nested_items.name: KnownGender
nested_items.description: Retrieves the known gender for the celebrity.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: A string value of the KnownGender info about the Celebrity.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: Job identifier for the celebrity recognition operation for which you want to obtain results. The job identifer is returned by an initial call to StartCelebrityRecognition.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: Name of the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: S3 object key name.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: If the bucket is versioning enabled, you can specify the object version.

nested_items.name: JobTag
nested_items.description: A job identifier specified in the call to StartCelebrityRecognition and returned in the job completion notification sent to your Amazon Simple Notification Service topic.
